name: GenerateFinancialPeriodAuditExport
description: Generates the audit file for the given audit and optionally its type, if there's one or more to choose from. Get these via the `GetFinancialPeriodAuditOutputTypes`

properties.name: FinancialPeriodAuditID
properties.description: Financial period audit to generate the document for

properties.name: Type
properties.description: Type of audit document to generate
